title: Russ Breault was on The Hagmann & Hagmann Report on Yesterday
post: Beautiful interview. I only started in the middle last night but loved it. Russ is giving a lot of biblical insights about how the Shroud fits in the way God deals with us. It was amazing. God bless
author: Mike M

title: Russ Breault was on The Hagmann & Hagmann Report on Yesterday
post: Russ is always educational!  So glad to have listened to this on before Easter…by 10:40 am Holy Saturday over and out … ready for Resurrection!
author: Annette Cloutier
